A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It pains me to say this as I never thought i would utter these words but I didn't like a Star Wars movie.

This felt like a chapter in a book that had nothing to do with the rest of the chapters.  This may have made a fine plot for his own trilogy but was totally out of context in the Skywalker story.

I have never left a Star Wars movie in my feeling confused/upset/disappointed/insert adj here.

This pains my heart as I literally live for star Wars movies.

I'm sure Rian Johnson tried to make a good movie but as we all know: Do or Do not\, there is no try.

Rian: You did not! :(
